name: extend
title: Extends the current status by the given attributes

name: new
title: Creates a new status from the given attributes

name: remove
title: Removes the given attributes from the status

name: copy
title: Copies the value of given attributes to attributes with the specified name

name: rename
title: Renames the given attributes to the specified names

name: math
title: Evaluates a given mathematical expression and adds the result

name: random
title: Includes a random value from a specified distribution

name: decide
title: Determines a value according to a given logic
